XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.1_0: yenedaṃ svecchayā sarvaṃ māyayā mohitaṃ jagat /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.14_0: jagati brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vṛtticchede tvayā kṛte /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.15_1: tasmāttvaṃ diviro nāma bhuvi khyāto bhaviṣyasi //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.35_1: luṇṭhyā vadhyāśca pūjyā ye sarva ityavadanmadāt //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.39_1: hyaḥ kiyanto mayā dattāḥ prāyasthā vijayeśvare //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.56_0: sa cāsti bhuvi vikhyātaḥ kāyastho bhavatā samaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.57_0: brahmahatyā na gaṇyante govadheṣu kathaiva kā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.58_0: anye 'pi santi sarvatra tadvidhastu na labhyate /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.58_1: nītaḥ svajanako yena nidhanaṃ bandhane dhanī //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.59_0: yadi nāma bhavatpuṇyaiḥ sa sameṣyati madgirā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.65_0: sa mahāntaṃ samāsādya duḥsahaṃ daṃśanaṃ viṭam /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.92_0: tathā hi tāmrajaḥ pūrvaṃ mahān nīto ghaṭo mayā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.93_0: kālena ghaṇṭāṃ vikrīya tadaṃśena kṛtā ghaṭī /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.93_1: krameṇa bhakṣitā sāpi kṛtā śeṣeṇa ghaṇṭikā //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.119_1: aśo[kaḥ] satataṃ rogī niyogī jayati prabhuḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.121_1: kā nāma gaṇanā tasya nṛṣu sarvāparādhiṣu //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.122_1: iti tasya mukhādghoraṃ na cacāla vacaḥ sadā //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.123_0: pañcaṣāḥ satataṃ tasya karabhā iva bhārikāḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.130_0: kṛttāṅguṣṭhaḥ sa vāmena pāṇinā diviro rahaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.144_0: hāro bhārāyate hematāṭaṅkaṃ me na vallabham /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_1.145_1: iti darpagirā tasyā nābhavat kasya vismayaḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.10_1: khalvāṭaṃ tundilaṃ vṛddhaṃ svapatiṃ sahate katham //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.12_1: na ca duḥkhābhibhūtāsau rāgadagdhā na lakṣyate //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.19_1: itthaṃ kā nāma na mayā kṛtā śīlaparāṅmukhī //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.23_0: na kālo yadi nāmāsau tat kiṃ jīvanahṛnnṛṇām /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.31_1: purāṇapuṃścalī sā hi jāhnavīṃ manyate tṛṇam //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.35_1: re re dāsīsutetyādi janaṃ kopena bhartsayan //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.42_0: bhābhūto kuṅkumārdrau ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ _ rainaisaddṛśau _ _ _ _ ^ _ _ ^ ^ ^ musimusi lakṣaṇau phenaparvau /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.42_1: _ _ _ _ ^ _ _ maṇikanakadharau divyagandhānuliptau saṅgrāmeṇa praviṣṭau palupa ^ ^ ^ nau labhyatāṃ rājyalakṣmīḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.44_0: ityādi dattvā bālānāṃ nityaṃ phalahakeṣu saḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.50_0: nāyaṃ kiñcinmahābhāgo jānāti na ca budhyate /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.50_1: iti no bhejire lajjā vivastrā api tasya tāḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.53_0: bhrātṛjāyāṃ svasāraṃ ca tāṃ ca bhāryāṃ mṛgīdṛśam /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.55_1: dhūrtāḥ svādhīnatāṃ prāptāṃ svairiṇīṃ tāṃ siṣevire //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.71_1: ājīvamīśvaraḥ śūlī yena na tyajyate janaḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.72_0: sa vaidyaḥ kālakūṭo vā vyālo vetāla eva vā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.74_1: sthitaṃ bhuktaṃ nu pītaṃ nu vaidyeneti pralāpinaḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.75_2: janatā yāti yanmāndyaṃ tadvaidyasya śaneḥ phalam //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.76_1: nṛṇāṃ tridoṣakṛtsatyaṃ vaidya eva na tu jvaraḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.78_0: upasṛtya sa pasparśa stanau tasyāḥ susaṃhatau /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.79_0: laṅghanaṃ sahate naiṣā hitaṃ śūle na vṛṃhaṇam /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.79_1: karotu mama cintāsu sarvāhāraṃ mayā saha //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.80_0: jaḍā hyasyāḥ sthitā buddhirdhātuśca viṣamaḥ sthitaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.85_0: na kaścidupakāraṃ te manyate śatravaśca te /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.85_1: santi tebhyo bhayaṃ deharakṣāyāṃ naiva bādhate //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.86_0: durbalo dṛśyase bhrātaryūṣaṃ na kuruṣe katham /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.86_1: apyasti kāmalā nūnaṃ tāṃ mantreṇa nudāmyaham //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.88_1: dhūrto dhūlipaṭe cakre rāśicakraṃ mudhaiva saḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.94_1: tāsāṃ madhyān mṛtāḥ pañca pañca śeṣāḥ sthitāḥ khale //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.97_1: baddhaṃ mayā tatkalatraṃ mudritaṃ sakalaṃ gṛham //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.98_1: pradadau māsavṛttyaiva te mayā tadgṛhe dhṛtāḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.112_1: veśyākāminiyogivañcanaguruḥ sadvṛttaśūnyo guruś citraṃ sarvaguruḥ śivoditamahāśikṣāsu nityaṃ laghuḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.113_0: api nāma sa jāyeta pavitracaritaḥ kṣitau /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.119_0: karoti praśrayaṃ vakti madhuraṃ diviraḥ puraḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.123_0: nūnaṃ niśi bhagāpānaṃ karoti diviraḥ sadā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.125_0: vipraṃ puraḥ samāyāntaṃ thūtkṛtya tvaritaḥ punaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.132_0: jāmātuḥ śrīmato dṛṣṭvā sa gṛhaṃ harṣanirbharaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_2.138_0: kṛtaḥ parājito jetā jayī yaiśca parājitaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.5_0: sruksruvau samidho darbhā lājāḥ siddhārtakā ghṛtam /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.20_0: eko dvau bahavaḥ paścānninyuste bhastrayā tathā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.28_0: hāreṇa kiṃ sumadhyāyāḥ sukeśyāḥ kusumena kim /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.29_0: kiṃ dharmo yatra no raṇḍā dhiksukhaṃ raṇḍayā vinā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.30_0: raṇḍā vilokya taruṇaṃ karoti bhrukuṭiṃ mṛṣā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.32_1: sravantī nirbharaṃ reto raṇḍā dhenuḥ payo yathā //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.33_0: gauraḥ supīvaro dhatte raṇḍāyā muṇḍito bhagaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.34_1: yadi nāma rate śakto raṇḍāṃ toṣayituṃ na vā //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.42_0: gatvā gurugṛhaṃ raṇḍā patyuḥ parvadine satī /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.48_0: ihaiva suciraṃ nātha yāgavyagre tvayi sthite /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.49_0: ya eṣa prathito loke gṛhakṛtye mahattamaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.51_1: yato mūrdhni tvayā hastastasya pañcaphaṇo dhṛtaḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.57_0: tailonmṛṣṭe manāksneho vadane na tu cakṣuṣi /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.67_1: hastaṃ dattvā bhage vṛddho nidhānamiva rakṣati //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.68_1: rātrau vamati tatsarvaṃ bhajate vā viṣūcikām //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.69_1: sajane taruṇī dṛṣṭvā hrītā yāti rasātalam //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.76_1: guruṇā saha te śiṣyāḥ papurbhuktottaraṃ ciram //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.81_0: tataḥ kṣībo guruḥ kiṃ citsvakāvyaṃ deśabhāṣayā /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.92_0: iti bruvāṇe tanmitre taiḥ śiṣyaiḥ sahite gurau /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.95_0: sa rājñā hṛtasarvasvaḥ praklinno bandhane ciram /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.100_0: aho bata muhūrtena bhavanti na bhavanti ca /
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.102_1: piśāca iva duṣprekṣyo dinaireva babhūva saḥ //
XXksnarm_u:knarm_3.113_1: api sujanavinodāyombhitā hāsyasiddhyai kathayati phalabhūtaṃ sarvalokopadeśam //
